attributes.action: Reduction of all fuel duty in the Uk by £0.15
attributes.additional_details:
The Uk has some ofthe cheapest fuel in the Eu pirior to taxation @ which point it is the most expensive
The Cost of fuel Effect all aspect of the Uk
By reducing the fuel duty by 15 pence a litre the uk goverment would be giving Business a breather
The Uk road haulage industry is hardest hit and the high cost of fuel is sending small to mid sized firms out of business and costing jobs
Higher fuel cost mean also higher price in shops and people spending less
And numerous other examples

A REDUCTION IN FUEL DUTY BY 15 PENCE WILL HELP GET THE UK BACK ON IT FEET
